text: Jo tame te (muham'mada sa.A.Va.)Ni madada nahim karo to, allaha'e ja temani madada kari, te samaye jyare temane inkara karanara'o'e kadhi mukya hata, be manthi bijo, jyare ke te banne guphamam hata, tyare te potana mitrane kahi rahya hata ke nirasa na tha'o, allaha apani sathe che, basa! Allaha ta'ala'e potana taraphathi te lokone santi api, te laskaro dvara temani madada kari jene tame joya ja nathi, tene inkara karanara'oni vata halaki kari didhi ane unci ane mulyavana to allahani vata ja che, allaha vijayi, hikamatavalo che
